title: Write a blog post
description: Write a blog post about the benefits of using a Todo App.

title: Finish the project proposal
description: Review the project proposal and make any necessary changes. Then, send it to the client for approval.

title: Go to the grocery store
description: Buy the following items: milk, eggs, bread, cheese, and apples.

title: Pay the bills
description: Pay the electric bill, water bill, and internet bill.

title: Clean the house
description: Vacuum, dust, and mop the floors. Clean the bathrooms and kitchen. Make the beds and put away laundry.
subtasks: Make beds and put away laundry

title: Call the dentist for an appointment
description: Call the dentist to schedule an appointment for a cleaning and checkup.

title: Write a thank-you note
description: Write a thank-you note to your friend for the gift they sent you.

title: Plan your vacation
description: Book your flights and hotel, and plan your activities for your upcoming vacation.
